Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with a very small lump in December 2016 and had a lumpectomy and radiotherapy. I was immediately prescribed Tamoxifen. I have not taken it yet as I think the side effects are quite scary. I I may not get any but also read not for post menopausal women...? Anyone had any experience I am 68
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen for post menopausal women
